name: Guardian (itch)
description:
Make your way through the unknown as the guardian of a lost child.

---

CONTROLS:

Press Q/W/A/S to move, attack, or clear a path in a given direction.

Press Z/X to rotate.

Press spacebar to end your turn.

You can also move with the arrow keys or number pad.

---

To open the exit, find 2 keys in each level by searching your surroundings and defeating enemies.

Red heart icons represent your health.

Green fist icons represent your strength.

Blue foot icons represent your energy -- moving costs 2 energy, while attacking costs 3 energy.

---

Press the pause button during your turn to remap controls, restart a level, or adjust other options.

--

Originally created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 34.
